name: Yeenoghu
immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Yeenoghu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: detect magic * 3/day each: dispel magic, fear, invisibility * 1/day: teleport

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Yeenoghu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Yeenoghu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.desc: When Yeenoghu reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on his turn, Yeenoghu can take a bonus action to move up to half his speed and make a bite attack.
